description:
Mankey is a basic fighting type monkey Pok√©mon have a round, pig like snout that can be found in the grassy areas of Kanto and Johto. It is usually calm and somewhat mischievous, but if it gets angry it can be very dangerous.
In the anime series, a Mankey stole Ash Ketchum`s trademark red cap. After chasing the Mankey for a while, it evolved into a Primeape which Ash then caught.
name: Mankey
